name: Wild Americas The Game
description:
Wild Americas is a 3rd person exploratory, survival adventure game fused with action and RPG elements coupled with an accompanying graphic novel series that impacts your in-game adventures.

Be sure to check out our Kickstarter Campaign before the download for more information.

Our unique approach to storytelling intimately ties the Graphic Novel to the gameverse. The novels take a deep dive into the history of Mountain Island. Journey alongside a group of characters who are also NPC’s in the game. Learn from their experiences and discoveries as they uncover the dark past and modern dangers of Mountain Island. 

Cryptic messages, hidden locations and critical information found in the novels will aid in your in-game quests.

Our story will be told in 6 Chapters, released throughout 2023 and into 2024 via Steam, Xbox and PlayStation starting in July with Wild Americas The Game: Prologue.  Each chapter will introduce new stories, characters, locations, missions and more.

If you want to see the latest Dev Updates, concept art and more check out our Discord
